OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord gender , prior neoadjuvant concurrent adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy ( yes v ) , time since prior surgery ( le 6 month vs 6 12 month vs 12 month ) . Patients randomize 1 2 arm . All patient receive behavioral intervention comprise smoke cessation advice education day 1 . Patients quit smoking day 8 . Patients receive nicotine transdermal patch daily day 8-77 . - Arm I : Patients receive oral bupropion daily day 1-3 twice daily day 4-77 . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo arm I .
